name: Interesting trip in highland - Buon Ma Thuot city
description:
Daklak province has large area and it is almost covered by forest. To come Buon Ma Thuot from Ho Chi Minh city, we have 2 ways: Bus and airplane. It makes 45 minutes to come there by plane and 10 hours by bus. 
 Buon Ma Thuot has not been impacted, therefore it still keeps natural landscape. You can feel fresh atmosphere and see special customs of local people such as drink rice wine which is annealing by sticky rice,husk or , listen song by Gongs and live in special house,etc.  Buon Ma Thuot is the unique destination for people who love nature and being adventurous person. Especially, Buon Ma Thuot is famous for coffee. When someone say about Buon Ma Thuot, the first muse is " highland of coffee" . If you are coffee-aholic, you should visit Buon Ma Thuot, Because you can taste the special coffee. Moreover, when you come to Buon Ma Thuot, you will see how to people make coffee power and.
All in all, I think that Buon Ma Thuot city gives tourists a memorial trip.
